long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doodle Trump: Bounce to Greatness!
Are you ready to jump into the wild world of Doodle Trump? Dive into this hilarious and addictive twist on the classic Doodle Jump game! Play as Trump and bounce your way through levels filled with quirky challenges and surprises. Whether you're a fan of political satire or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, Doodle Trump is your ticket to a great time!

Features:
üïπÔ∏è Endless Fun: Navigate through an infinite number of platforms and keep bouncing higher and higher. How far can you go?

üòÇ Hilarious Sounds: Enjoy a variety of funny and over-the-top sound effects that will keep you laughing with every jump and fall!

üé® Vibrant Graphics: Enjoy colorful and detailed graphics that bring each level to life. The charming and humorous art style adds an extra layer of fun to your jumps.

Why You'll Love It:
Easy to Play: Simple tilt and tap controls make Doodle Trump perfect for players of all ages.
Laugh-Out-Loud Moments: Packed with satire and humor, it's the perfect game for a quick laugh.
Totally Free: Enjoy endless jumping fun without spending a dime. Optional in-app purchases are available for those who want to enhance their experience.
